mapper.select: select * from comment order by created_at desc limit 1;
select * from comment where post_id=#{postId} order by parent_comment_id, seq, depth
select * from comment where parent_comment_id=#{parentCommentId} order by parent_comment_id, seq, depth
mapper.insert: insert into comment (ip, contents, parent_comment_id, seq, depth, is_hide, post_id) values (#{ip}, #{contents}, #{parentCommentId}, #{seq}, #{depth}, #{isHide}, #{postId})
mapper.update: update comment set contents=#{contents}, parent_comment_id=#{parentCommentId}, seq=#{seq}, is_hide=#{isHide} where id=#{id}
